item.title: Heavenly-arms Come Join
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Plaz, please add your images on your thread instead of making people click on each one individually. Also you don’t need to type in capitals to get your point across lol.

You're not showing your a fit owner, in any way. Considering I am just talking and then you decide to be vulgar and rude for no apparent reason.
This is a major problem with many server owners nowadays. I think one of the most important traits to being a successful server owner is to be able to control your emotions. I.e not taking things personally and getting mad at what people say. Doing so will make you a very unstable owner and your players will find you unpleasant and quit.

Read full topic

item.title: Heavenly-arms Come Join
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I haven’t once “Talked shit”. I said there is nothing in this advertisement that sets it apart from other servers. I asked you, and I quote:

sk8rdude461:

Why should I play it?

In which you responded with:

you dont gota play if u dont want to lol so

You really aren’t trying to get players, are you?
You’re not showing your a fit owner, in any way. Considering I am just talking and then you decide to be vulgar and rude for no apparent reason.

PlazClan1:

nah i being nice if u gonna really talk shit about the server than why u even post than i am a nice owner

Understand that the server owner makes the server.

Your responses here so far have shown that you aren’t a very good one.

Read full topic
